http.html:
Providing Friendship and Support For Adults in Need

  • Home
  • About us
  • Success stories
  • Can we help
  • Can you help
  • Foodbank
  • News
  • Contact
  • Daylight Shop
  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Menu

Daylight Centre Fellowship

Daylight Centre Fellowship is an independent local charity in the East Midlands. We strive to help people in Wellingborough and the surrounding districts of North Northamptonshire in meeting personal challenges that range from complex mental health issues, drug and alcohol abuse, learning difficulties, to homelessness or just feeling fragile, isolated and alone.

We can help you

....by offering time, space and practical guidance, by making you feel welcome and by addressing any problems you might have.

Learn more!

You can help

...by donating your time, skills, clothes or money. Every donation makes a big difference.

Find out more!

Keep informed

...about what we get up to by reading our News section or our bi-monthly newsletters.

Read on!

Donations needed

Latest Posts

  • DCF News Special Edition

  • Restricted Access to Car Park

  • DCF News Spring 2018

  • Winter Newsletter 2017

we appreciate all your help

Financial donations keep us going

Help keep the centre open. Every penny helps with our projects and day-to-day running of the centre. 

Having a clearout?

Donate spare clothing and household items

Your time is precious. 

We'll use it wisely. We are currently on the lookout for volunteers to help in the centre. 

Please click here for further details

 

 

 

 

 

10 High Street Place
Wellingborough
Northants NN8 4HP
Tel: 01933 446 490
Email: info@daylightcf.org

Registered Charity No. 1100809
Company No. 4625186

Privacy Policy

 

Site by LenkaPage.com
